'''''Culmination of the Great Dream''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach the Max Level of the [[Tree of Dreams]] in [[Vanarana (Area)]].
